title: How to Make a Raspberry Vanilla Milkshake

methods.name: Making a Raspberry Ice Cream Milkshake

steps.headline: Scoop the raspberry flavoured ice cream into a large coffee mug or glass.
Add milk.
steps.description: Add the milk all the way to the top of the glass. Or, experiment to find out how thick you would like it to be. Then, stir it until all the ice cream is melted.

steps.headline: Add a tablespoon of powdered or regular sugar.
steps.description: Stir it in, serve and enjoy!

methods.name: Making a Vanilla Ice Cream Milkshake

steps.headline: Place the ice cream into the blender.
Add enough milk to blend it all together.
Place the lid on the blender.
steps.description: Blend to combine. When all of the ingredients are combined, it's done.

steps.headline: Pour the raspberry vanilla milkshake into a glass.

methods.name: Making a Real Raspberry Vanilla Milkshake

steps.headline: Add the raspberries to the blender.
steps.description: Be sure to clean them before use. Frozen raspberries can be used in place of fresh ones.

steps.headline: Place the ice cream scoops into the blender.
Place the lid on the blender.
steps.description: Blend to combine. When the raspberries are broken down, the milkshake is ready.

steps.headline: Pour the raspberry vanilla milkshake into a tall glass.

text: Making a Raspberry Ice Cream Milkshake Scoop the raspberry flavoured ice cream into a large coffee mug or glass.  Add milk. Add the milk all the way to the top of the glass. Or, experiment to find out how thick you would like it to be. Then, stir it until all the ice cream is melted. Add the vanilla extract. Stir it in. Add a tablespoon of powdered or regular sugar. Stir it in, serve and enjoy! Making a Vanilla Ice Cream Milkshake Place the ice cream into the blender.  Pour in the raspberry juice.  Add enough milk to blend it all together.  Place the lid on the blender. Blend to combine. When all of the ingredients are combined, it's done. Pour the raspberry vanilla milkshake into a glass. Serve immediately. Making a Real Raspberry Vanilla Milkshake Add the raspberries to the blender. Be sure to clean them before use. Frozen raspberries can be used in place of fresh ones. Place the ice cream scoops into the blender.  Pour in the milk.  Place the lid on the blender. Blend to combine. When the raspberries are broken down, the milkshake is ready. Pour the raspberry vanilla milkshake into a tall glass. Add a straw and serve.
